content: स्कंदः [स्कंद्-अच्] {@--1@} Leaping. {@--2@} Quicksilver. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kārtikeya; सेनानीनामहं स्कंदः <ls>Bg. 10. 24</ls>, <ls>R. 2. 36</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 1</ls>; <ls>Me. 43.</ls> {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--5@} The body. {@--6@} A king. {@--7@} The bank of a river. {@--8@} A clever man. {@--9@} A kind of disease common to children.
